english.segment1: Every morning there's a warning that you follow. It's getting harder you know. To fill the moments of the morning. They're so hollow. Fill up on empty and go
english.segment2: And every morning there's a brokenness you swallow. You try to let go. Of every warning that your wanting, want to follow?. Your signs are starting to show
english.segment3: CHORUS: I can see it in your eyes. You were made to overcome. I can see it in your eyes. You were made to rise above. I can see it in your eyes. So take these wings and fly
english.segment4: And for tomorrow there's a bottom of a bottle. It's getting harder you know. To dry the problem at the bottom of a bottle. Before it's out of control
english.segment6: And every morning there's a warning that you follow. It's getting harder you know
